txt.en: Neivion and his band are scouting the northern bank of the Swiftwater River after crossing a ford to the north-east of Brockbridge.
Neivion and his band are scouting the northern bank of the Swiftwater River after crossing a ford to the north-east of Brockbridge.
Neivion and his band are defeated and no longer a threat to either Brockbridge or Woodhurst.
You defeated the mighty Neivion and his band who will no longer threaten to surround Brockbridge, or to attack Woodhurst.
Neivion leads a strong band of Dunlending warriors that managed to cross a ford of the Swiftwater River to the north-east of Brockbridge.

Neivion leads a raid party of elite Dunlending warriors who crossed the Swiftwater River into the northern Stonedeans. They crossed the shallows to the north and east of Brockbridge, and are now a threat to both Brockbridge and Woodhurst.
